channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: White paint spillage, 17th September
item.description:
Huge amount of white paint spilled outside flats. Pavement is covered please can we clear.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Findon Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped furniture, 17th September
item.description:
There’s a lot of dumped furniture outside Buchan Resident’s Hall. One part has fallen over and is completely blocking the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buchan Road, Nunhead, London

item.title: Lights on 24 hours, 17th September
item.description:
I have reported this several times, since first in 2021. The outside lights around Chelsfield Point are illuminated 24hours a day. In May, when I last reported it, I was told it would be looked into. Someone is not looking hard enough! They are still on!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Penshurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain pipe, 17th September
item.description:
No 27 Camborne Road has a rain water drainpipe going from their roof over to Shoulder of Mutton Green. Surely this is illegal?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newlyn Road, Falconwood, London

item.title: Fly tip keeps growing, 17th September
item.description:
Same fly tip I reported months ago. It has gotten bigger and more dangerous since. We've been dealing with pests in the building because of it, the entire building and surrounding residential properties have to endure this dangerous mess

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Martello Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned car, 17th September
item.description:
This car has been abandoned from about March of this year. Tyres are going flat and it is damaged. Obviously abandoned even though it has a current MOT and tax, probably no insurance but unable to check for that. I see from a previous post that this was reported back in July and the car is still there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wishart Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 17th September
item.description:
There's a lorry-sized amount of furniture, clothes, and food dumped right in the middle of our square. It's been there for many months, but getting seriously bad lately. Should someone check this?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin, 17th September
item.description:
The bin at the end of Farnaby road is overflowing and has led to people leaving rubbish and dog poo bags all over the floor. This is of significant health and safety concern due to its proximity to the school with many children passing the bin in the morning and afternoon
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farnaby Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the bus lane in front of 234 kilburn high road, 17th September
item.description:
There's a significant pothole in the middle of the bus lane. It's about 40 cm long and 10 cm wide at its center, with a depth of 15 cm. The edges are sharp and uneven, posing a clear hazard to cyclists and vehicles. This isn't the first incident linked to this pothole, and it continues to be a major safety concern.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
